segments.text: Hi Ron , this is Kim at headquarters .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , hi Kim . How ’ s it going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great , thanks . I was calling to change our meeting next week .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok , sure . When did you have in mind ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I was hoping we could reschedule for early next month , Our trip has been postponed until the 2nd .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don ’ t ’ we say the 3rd around 2:00 p . m . ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That works for me ! I will call you when I get into town to reconfirm .
segments.speaker: S1
